summary: at long last somebody has created a working Esbern fix that you dont need to edit your game in any way other than installing a mod!!!
descriptionHtml:
I found that the whole Esbern not talking and not opening his door has gotten quite annoying so I took some of my time to make this.

This should fix all of the bugs linked to the main quest line involving Esbern. (it SHOULD fix them)

I recommend having it at the top of your load order, it could save you lots of time trying to tell me to fix a non existent problem :P

PLEASE LEAVE A COMMENT, did it work? i would like to know these things so i can fix it
author: Firestar0507

files.name: esbern voice fix mod organizer compatable
files.fileName: esbern voice fix mod organizer compatable-57163-.rar
